      • delete

        public int delete(int idGroup)
        Delete a group from the table group. If the group is associated to students, the deletion won't be done Auto-commit by default: each deletion is effective
        Parameters:
        idGroup - the id of the group to delete
        Returns:
        returnValue the number of lines deleted from the table
